code: import React,{createContext,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const login=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(true);};const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("token");setIsLoggedIn(false);navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{isLoggedIn,login,logout},children:children});};
